page.title: 11HOME LIFE
page.content:
AREA SOUTH OF WESTWOODSIDE
LIVING IN WHAT ONE WOULD DESCRIBE AS A REMOTE AREA DOESN'T INTERFERE WITH THE QULITY OR ENJOYMENT OF LIFE. ALMOST WITHOUT EXCEPTION EACH HOUSEHOLD HAS ITS OWN TRANSPORT WHICH SOON LINKS THEM WITH THE ADJOINING VILLAGE OR NEAREST TOWN FOR SHOPPING. ALL HOMES HAVE ELECTTICITY, SO HAVE THE ADVANTAGES OF FRIDGES, FREEZERS, COOKERS, TELEVISIONS, VIDEOS AND COMPUTERS, THE NUMBER DEPENDING ON THEIR FINANCIAL STATUS. THE TELEPHONE IS ESSENTIAL. THEY INTERACT SOCIALLY BETWEEN NEIGHBOURS AND AT DEBDHILL FARM, THE FAMILY HAVE BUILT KTHEIR OWN SWIMMING POOL AND TENNIS COURTS. FAMILY PETS ARE MUCH IN EVIDENCE, PARTICULARLY CATS AND DOGS, THE LATTER EITHER AS GUARD OR WORKING. THE FARMERS HAVE SHOOTING AND FISHING.
